title: Hands-on with Bee, Amazon’s latest AI wearable
description: We tried Amazon's new AI wearable Bee. It's not for pro users yet, but more features are expected this year.
content: We tried Amazon's new AI wearable Bee. It's not for pro users yet, but more features are expected this year.
